Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated

Class LightLobbyList

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated.LightLobbyList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightLobbyList extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class is a container for the list of lobbies.
